required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Development of a Genetic Counseling Patient Preference Intervention for Women at Elevated Risk for Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Development of a Genetic Counseling Patient Preference Intervention for Women at Elevated Risk for Breast Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center

clinical_study.source: Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center

brief_summary.textblock: This study develops a genetic counseling patient preference intervention for women at elevated risk for breast cancer. This study aims to develop an intervention that may deliver educational videos about breast cancer, heredity, multigene tests results and polygenic risk score, provide multigene and polygenic test results, obtain information about patients' questions/ concerns about test results to use in post-genetic test counseling, and determine patient preference (e.g. telephone) for receipt of post-genetic test counseling.

detailed_description.textblock:
PRIMARY OBJECTIVE:
I. Develop the Genetic Counseling Patient Preference (GCPP) intervention in collaboration with community members.
OUTLINE:
Participants attend a focus group over 90-120 minutes providing feedback on GCPP intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Development of Genetic Counseling Patient Preference (GCPP) intervention

arm_group.description: Participants attend a focus group over 90-120 minutes providing feedback on GCPP intervention.

study_pop.textblock: Women at elevated risk for breast cancer

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female
- Ages 35-64
- Known elevated risk for breast cancer
- The ability to speak and read English
- Provide written consent

overall_official.affiliation: Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center

overall_contact.last_name: The Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center

facility.name: Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center
